channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32802|2024-09-24T19:24:19.160Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20pre-orders
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Pre-Orders plugin <= 1.9.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-32801|2024-09-24T19:24:26.974Z -- woocommerce -- composite%20products
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce Composite Products plugin <= 8.7.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-32793|2024-09-24T19:24:11.594Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20pre-orders
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Pre-Orders plugin <= 2.0.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34004|2024-09-24T19:09:23.236Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20box%20office
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Box Office plugin <= 1.1.50 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-32746|2024-09-24T19:24:02.000Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20brands
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Brands plugin <= 1.6.45 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-33317|2024-09-24T19:23:11.749Z -- woocommerce -- returns%20and%20warranty%20requests
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WooCommerce Returns and Warranty Requests plugin <= 2.1.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35049|2024-07-01T18:44:23.320Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20stripe%20payment%20gateway
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway.This issue affects WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway: from n/a through 7.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37297|2024-06-13T19:59:46.310Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce
item.description: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce platform built on WordPress. A vulnerability introduced in WooCommerce 8.8 allows for cross-site scripting. A bad actor can manipulate a link to include malicious HTML & JavaScript content. While the content is not saved to the database, the links may be sent to victims for malicious purposes. The injected JavaScript could hijack content & data stored in the browser, including the session. The URL content is read through the `Sourcebuster.js` library and then inserted without proper sanitization to the classic checkout and registration forms. Versions 8.8.5 and 8.9.3 contain a patch for the issue. As a workaround, one may disable the Order Attribution feature.

item.title: CVE-2023-51499|2024-06-04T17:20:18.268Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20shipping%20per%20product
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce Shipping Per Product.This issue affects WooCommerce Shipping Per Product: from n/a through 2.5.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-35881|2024-06-04T17:18:15.956Z -- woocommerce -- woocommerce%20one%20page%20checkout
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WooCommerce WooCommerce One Page Checkout allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WooCommerce One Page Checkout: from n/a through 2.3.0.

item.description: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce platform built on WordPress. A vulnerability introduced in WooCommerce 8.8 allows for cross-site scripting. The injected JavaScript could hijack content & data stored in the browser, including the session. The URL content is read through the `Sourcebuster.js` library and then inserted without proper sanitization to the classic checkout and registration forms. Versions 8.8.5 and 8.9.3 contain a patch for the issue. As a workaround, one may disable the Order Attribution feature.

A bad actor can manipulate a link to include malicious HTML & JavaScript content. While the content is not saved to the database, the links may be sent to victims for malicious purposes. The injected JavaScript could hijack content & data stored in the browser, including the session.
